1.0.name: wordpress/wp-portfolio
1.0.description:
A plugin that allows you to show off your website portfolio through a single page on your wordpress blog with automatically generated thumbnails. To show your portfolio, create a new page and paste [wp-portfolio] into it.

Features Include:

  • Automatically generated website thumbnails (to save you hassle)
  • Ability to fully customise the layout (through HTML and CSS) if required.
  • The option to use a custom image rather than a screenshot (e.g. for showing off graphic design work).
  • Support for grouping entries to categorise your work.
  • and more!

The plugin requires you to have a free (or paid) account with Shrink The Web if you wish to generate the thumbnails dynamically. Please read the first FAQ about account types to learn more.

However, you do not nee
